external_references.source_name: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022
external_references.description: Alexandre Cote Cyr. (2022, March 23). Mustang Panda’s Hodur: Old tricks, new Korplug variant. Retrieved September 9, 2025.
Raggi, M. et al. (2022, March 7). The Good, the Bad, and the Web Bug: TA416 Increases Operational Tempo Against European Governments as Conflict in Ukraine Escalates. Retrieved March 16, 2022.
Vasilenko, R. (2013, December 17). An Analysis of PlugX Malware. Retrieved November 24, 2015.

objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) can use the Windows API functions `GetProcAddress`, `LoadLibrary`, and `CreateProcess` to execute another process.(Citation: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022)(Citation: Proofpoint TA416 Europe March 2022)(Citation: Lastline PlugX Analysis)
